d4a9c051-667e-4e43-8d57-e721115189e1.assessmentName: AutomationFirst Corp Data Platform Assessment - Q4 2025
d4a9c051-667e-4e43-8d57-e721115189e1.assessmentDescription: GenAI readiness and ML platform evaluation

responses.env_standardization_comment: Legacy legacy IAM environment is hurting productivity. We have 30+ workspaces with constant no lineage tracking. Our data engineering team wastes 60% of time troubleshooting instead of delivering value. Need to consolidate to Databricks.
responses.scaling_effectiveness_comment: Running outdated Azure DevOps with 30+ workspaces. System performance degrading - experiencing cost overruns weekly. Maintenance window growing, business getting frustrated. Evaluating Databricks for 10x improvement.
responses.auth_consistency_comment: Legacy custom Python scripts environment is hurting productivity. We have 30+ workspaces with constant cost overruns. Our data engineering team wastes 60% of time troubleshooting instead of delivering value. Need to consolidate to Databricks.
responses.security_controls_comment: Currently on Azure DevOps which lacks modern capabilities. 150+ service accounts managed through manual processes and scripts. cost overruns preventing us from adopting GenAI and advanced analytics. Migration planning underway.
responses.governance_centralization_comment: Technical debt accumulating with manual Excel spreadsheets. We have 150+ service accounts that nobody wants to touch. access sprawl becoming existential risk. Board asking why we can't do real-time analytics like competitors.
responses.compliance_management_comment: Technical debt accumulating with legacy IAM. We have 500+ users that nobody wants to touch. no lineage tracking becoming existential risk. Board asking why we can't do real-time analytics like competitors.
responses.visibility_comprehensiveness_comment: Stuck on shared service accounts managing 200+ manual policies. Critical issues: security gaps, high TCO ($200K+ annually), vendor limitations. Business approved migration to modern Lakehouse - targeting 50% cost reduction.
responses.proactive_monitoring_comment: Stuck on shared service accounts managing 150+ service accounts. Critical issues: access sprawl, high TCO ($200K+ annually), vendor limitations. Business approved migration to modern Lakehouse - targeting 50% cost reduction.
responses.cost_tracking_comment: Currently using legacy IAM to handle this. We maintain 150+ service accounts which is becoming unmanageable. Major pain points: no lineage tracking, blocking our ability to innovate. Team spends 50%+ time on maintenance vs building new capabilities.
responses.optimization_practices_comment: Painful fragmentation: Terraform for ingestion, Snowflake for storage, manual Excel spreadsheets for transformation. 150+ service accounts scattered across tools. no lineage tracking due to lack of integration. Need unified Lakehouse platform.
responses.ingestion_resilience_comment: Technical debt accumulating with Stitch. We have 80+ SSIS packages that nobody wants to touch. frequent pipeline failures becoming existential risk. Board asking why we can't do real-time analytics like competitors.
responses.lakehouse_structure_comment: Stuck on Airflow managing 5TB daily ingestion. Critical issues: manual deployments, high TCO ($200K+ annually), vendor limitations. Business approved migration to modern Lakehouse - targeting 50% cost reduction.
responses.orchestration_reliability_comment: Current setup: DBT + Informatica PowerCenter with 20+ source systems. frequent pipeline failures causing SLA breaches and business impact. CTO pushing for unified platform - Databricks POC approved for Q1 2026.
responses.pipeline_lifecycle_comment: Technical debt accumulating with FiveTran. We have 200+ Informatica mappings that nobody wants to touch. $200K+ annual licensing becoming existential risk. Board asking why we can't do real-time analytics like competitors.
responses.quality_validation_comment: Operations bottleneck with Talend - managing 100+ Glue jobs. manual deployments limiting our competitive advantage. Cannot support real-time use cases or ML workloads with current architecture.
responses.quality_monitoring_comment: Painful fragmentation: DBT for ingestion, Snowflake for storage, Glue jobs for transformation. 20+ source systems scattered across tools. schema drift issues due to lack of integration. Need unified Lakehouse platform.
responses.performance_optimization_comment: Currently on Talend which lacks modern capabilities. 200+ Informatica mappings managed through manual processes and scripts. high maintenance burden preventing us from adopting GenAI and advanced analytics. Migration planning underway.
responses.scalability_demand_comment: Running outdated Azure Data Factory with 80+ SSIS packages. System performance degrading - experiencing high maintenance burden weekly. Maintenance window growing, business getting frustrated. Evaluating Databricks for 10x improvement.
responses.performance_consistency_comment: Operations bottleneck with Tableau - managing $40K monthly Snowflake costs. exploding costs limiting our competitive advantage. Cannot support real-time use cases or ML workloads with current architecture.
responses.metrics_consistency_comment: Currently on Qlik which lacks modern capabilities. 500+ queries daily managed through manual processes and scripts. data silos preventing us from adopting GenAI and advanced analytics. Migration planning underway.
responses.data_discovery_comment: We rely on MicroStrategy and Oracle for this today. Managing 50+ data marts manually with significant manual refreshes. Looking to modernize - current licensing costs $150K/year plus operational overhead.
responses.dashboard_integration_comment: Running outdated Oracle with 100+ Tableau dashboards. System performance degrading - experiencing inconsistent metrics weekly. Maintenance window growing, business getting frustrated. Evaluating Databricks for 10x improvement.
responses.reporting_governance_comment: Current setup: Tableau + Power BI with 1000+ business users. dashboard sprawl causing SLA breaches and business impact. CTO pushing for unified platform - Databricks POC approved for Q1 2026.
responses.user_empowerment_comment: Current setup: MicroStrategy + Tableau with 50+ data marts. manual refreshes causing SLA breaches and business impact. CTO pushing for unified platform - Databricks POC approved for Q1 2026.
responses.governed_autonomy_comment: Current setup: MicroStrategy + Qlik with 200+ Power BI reports. exploding costs causing SLA breaches and business impact. CTO pushing for unified platform - Databricks POC approved for Q1 2026.
responses.external_sharing_comment: Maintaining 200+ Power BI reports across fragmented Qlik infrastructure. Daily data silos requiring manual intervention. Team morale low due to technical debt. Executive mandate to modernize platform.
responses.cross_domain_analytics_comment: Currently on MicroStrategy which lacks modern capabilities. 50+ data marts managed through manual processes and scripts. data silos preventing us from adopting GenAI and advanced analytics. Migration planning underway.
responses.experiment_tracking_comment: Legacy SAS environment is hurting productivity. We have 200GB model artifacts with constant version chaos. Our data engineering team wastes 60% of time troubleshooting instead of delivering value. Need to consolidate to Databricks.
responses.model_reproducibility_comment: Multi-vendor cost spiral: Excel models ($120K/year), Snowflake warehouse ($40K/month), R scripts licenses ($80K/year). Total: $600K+ annually. Plus 50+ ML models and siloed work. ROI case for Databricks consolidation approved.
responses.feature_store_comment: Technical debt accumulating with custom Flask APIs. We have 20+ SageMaker endpoints that nobody wants to touch. manual deployment becoming existential risk. Board asking why we can't do real-time analytics like competitors.
responses.data_prep_comment: Multi-vendor cost spiral: SageMaker ($120K/year), Snowflake warehouse ($40K/month), custom Flask APIs licenses ($80K/year). Total: $600K+ annually. Plus 100+ untracked experiments and no experiment tracking. ROI case for Databricks consolidation approved.
responses.ml_ownership_comment: Current setup: Excel models + Jupyter notebooks with 100+ untracked experiments. slow iteration cycles causing SLA breaches and business impact. CTO pushing for unified platform - Databricks POC approved for Q1 2026.
responses.ml_compliance_comment: Running outdated MLflow OSS with 100+ untracked experiments. System performance degrading - experiencing manual deployment weekly. Maintenance window growing, business getting frustrated. Evaluating Databricks for 10x improvement.
responses.ml_scalability_comment: Maintaining 100+ untracked experiments across fragmented R scripts infrastructure. Daily slow iteration cycles requiring manual intervention. Team morale low due to technical debt. Executive mandate to modernize platform.
responses.genai_vision_comment: Currently using Azure OpenAI to handle this. We maintain 100K+ API calls monthly which is becoming unmanageable. Major pain points: zero ROI tracking, blocking our ability to innovate. Team spends 50%+ time on maintenance vs building new capabilities.
responses.use_case_definition_comment: Technical debt accumulating with Hugging Face. We have $10K+ monthly LLM costs that nobody wants to touch. security vulnerabilities becoming existential risk. Board asking why we can't do real-time analytics like competitors.
responses.knowledge_sources_comment: Operations bottleneck with LangChain - managing 10+ GenAI pilots. compliance gaps limiting our competitive advantage. Cannot support real-time use cases or ML workloads with current architecture.
responses.knowledge_governance_comment: Operations bottleneck with custom LLM wrappers - managing 100K+ API calls monthly. no governance limiting our competitive advantage. Cannot support real-time use cases or ML workloads with current architecture.
responses.application_capability_comment: Currently using LangChain to handle this. We maintain 20+ prompt templates which is becoming unmanageable. Major pain points: compliance gaps, blocking our ability to innovate. Team spends 50%+ time on maintenance vs building new capabilities.
responses.integration_patterns_comment: Technical debt accumulating with Chroma. We have 5+ use cases that nobody wants to touch. siloed experiments becoming existential risk. Board asking why we can't do real-time analytics like competitors.
responses.output_validation_comment: Maintaining 20+ prompt templates across fragmented custom LLM wrappers infrastructure. Daily compliance gaps requiring manual intervention. Team morale low due to technical debt. Executive mandate to modernize platform.
responses.genai_monitoring_comment: Stuck on Pinecone managing 5+ use cases. Critical issues: security vulnerabilities, high TCO ($200K+ annually), vendor limitations. Business approved migration to modern Lakehouse - targeting 50% cost reduction.
responses.ethical_guardrails_comment: Currently using custom LLM wrappers to handle this. We maintain 10+ GenAI pilots which is becoming unmanageable. Major pain points: compliance gaps, blocking our ability to innovate. Team spends 50%+ time on maintenance vs building new capabilities.
responses.genai_transparency_comment: We rely on OpenAI API and custom LLM wrappers for this today. Managing 3+ vector databases manually with significant no evaluation framework. Looking to modernize - current licensing costs $150K/year plus operational overhead.
responses.coe_structure_comment: Running outdated PagerDuty with $50K+ monthly cloud spend. System performance degrading - experiencing manual investigation weekly. Maintenance window growing, business getting frustrated. Evaluating Databricks for 10x improvement.
responses.coe_effectiveness_comment: Maintaining $50K+ monthly cloud spend across fragmented Excel cost tracking infrastructure. Daily 2+ hour MTTR requiring manual intervention. Team morale low due to technical debt. Executive mandate to modernize platform.
responses.collaboration_strength_comment: Running outdated DataDog with 10+ disconnected tools. System performance degrading - experiencing poor visibility weekly. Maintenance window growing, business getting frustrated. Evaluating Databricks for 10x improvement.
responses.asset_exchange_comment: Maintaining 500+ CloudWatch alarms across fragmented New Relic infrastructure. Daily alert fatigue requiring manual intervention. Team morale low due to technical debt. Executive mandate to modernize platform.
responses.training_programs_comment: Multi-vendor cost spiral: Grafana ($120K/year), Snowflake warehouse ($40K/month), Excel cost tracking licenses ($80K/year). Total: $600K+ annually. Plus 20+ monitoring dashboards and 2+ hour MTTR. ROI case for Databricks consolidation approved.
responses.continuous_learning_comment: Painful fragmentation: PagerDuty for ingestion, Snowflake for storage, New Relic for transformation. 30+ on-call engineers scattered across tools. no cost attribution due to lack of integration. Need unified Lakehouse platform.
responses.value_linkage_comment: We rely on PagerDuty and CloudWatch for this today. Managing 100GB+ logs daily manually with significant poor visibility. Looking to modernize - current licensing costs $150K/year plus operational overhead.
responses.value_reviews_comment: Stuck on DataDog managing 100GB+ logs daily. Critical issues: hidden costs, high TCO ($200K+ annually), vendor limitations. Business approved migration to modern Lakehouse - targeting 50% cost reduction.
responses.innovation_adoption_comment: We rely on PagerDuty and New Relic for this today. Managing 10+ disconnected tools manually with significant manual investigation. Looking to modernize - current licensing costs $150K/year plus operational overhead.
responses.continuous_improvement_comment: Painful fragmentation: Splunk for ingestion, Snowflake for storage, Grafana for transformation. 20+ monitoring dashboards scattered across tools. manual investigation due to lack of integration. Need unified Lakehouse platform.
